sentences.sentence: A firm might publish a privacy-protection policy, but who enforces it?
sentences.translation: 一家公司可能会公布一项隐私保护政策，但谁来执行呢？

sentences.sentence: Instead of including that paragraph, she added one that described Lengel's crabbed response to the girls so that she could lead up to the A & P "policy" he enforces.
sentences.translation: 她没有概括这段话，而是加上了一段话，描述了朗格尔对女孩们的乖僻反应，这样她就可以引导他执行 A&P “政策”。
